# Max Value

> Maximum [single-precision floating-point number][ieee754].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var FLOAT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float32-max' );
```

#### FLOAT32_MAX

Maximum [single-precision floating-point number][ieee754].

```javascript
var bool = ( FLOAT32_MAX === 3.4028234663852886e+38 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
var FLOAT32_MAX = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float32-max' );

// => 3.4028234663852886e+38
```
